00032         virtual bool    process(const btBroadphaseProxy* proxy) = 0;

00055 class btBroadphaseInterface
00056 {
00057 public:
00058         virtual ~btBroadphaseInterface() {}
00059 
00060         virtual btBroadphaseProxy*      createProxy(  const btVector3& aabbMin,  const btVector3& aabbMax,int shapeType,void* userPtr,  int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask, btDispatcher* dispatcher) =0;
00061         virtual void    destroyProxy(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btDispatcher* dispatcher)=0;
00062         virtual void    setAabb(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax, btDispatcher* dispatcher)=0;
00063         virtual void    getAabb(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btVector3& aabbMin, btVector3& aabbMax ) const =0;
00064 
00065         virtual void    rayTest(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo, btBroadphaseRayCallback& rayCallback, const btVector3& aabbMin=btVector3(0,0,0), const btVector3& aabbMax = btVector3(0,0,0)) = 0;
00066 
00067         virtual void    aabbTest(const btVector3& aabbMin, const btVector3& aabbMax, btBroadphaseAabbCallback& callback) = 0;
00068 
00070         virtual void    calculateOverlappingPairs(btDispatcher* dispatcher)=0;
00071 
00072         virtual btOverlappingPairCache* getOverlappingPairCache()=0;
00073         virtual const btOverlappingPairCache*   getOverlappingPairCache() const =0;
00074 
00077         virtual void getBroadphaseAabb(btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const =0;
00078 
00080         virtual void resetPool(btDispatcher* dispatcher) { (void) dispatcher; };
00081 
00082         virtual void    printStats() = 0;
00083 
00084 };
